titleStmt.title: Janua divorum, or, The lives and histories of the heathen gods, goddesses & demi-gods with divine and moral observations upon their most remarkable actions, adorned with 25 copper cuts proper to each deity, and put into verse / by Robert Whitcombe.
titleStmt.author: Whitcombe, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Downing for Francis Kirkman and are to be sold by most booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
